Title: Directs the assignment of a personal identification number to each application for acceptance to the state university and the city university
Summary: Provides that each state and city college or university assign a personal identification number to each application for acceptance to be used during the admissions process in place of any other identifying information including names and addresses.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the assignment of a personal identification number to each application for acceptance to the state university and the city university
